actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Charles J. Mangan.

summary.text: Relieves a named individual of all liability, under a specified Internal Revenue Code penalty and a specified district court judgment, for certain withholding and social security taxes not paid for a certain period by a corporation of which such individual was president and a shareholder. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to reimburse such individual for any amounts paid or withheld by such penalty or under such judgment.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Charles J. Mangan.
